name: Never Trust A Monkey
description:
Feed the monkeys to keep them docile while you clean up the park! They get hungry fast, so never trust that a monkey is friendly! The more trash you get out of the park the higher the critics will rate it! If you get too dirty while you're cleaning you will be pulled out of the park so inspections can be passed!

Get in there and remember the most important thing: Never trust a monkey!

Check out my YouTube channel: LINK

All assets, scripts, and sound fx were created by Axel Ward or retrieved from creative commons spaces.
